content.question: Two siblings, Alice and Sean, are both convinced that they are faster than the other at solving a puzzle cube. They recorded the length of time it took them to solve the cube 18 times each during a one-month period. Then each calculated the mean amount of time and standard deviation, in minutes, for their times. Let <math alttext="mu sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> equal the mean time it took Alice to solve the puzzle cube and <math alttext="mu sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> equal the mean time it took Sean. Which of the following are the appropriate null and alternative hypotheses to test for a difference in time for the siblings to solve the cube?

choices.label: <math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub S equals 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub S is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub S is less than 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub S is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub S equals 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub S is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: x bar sub A minus x bar sub S equals 0. H sub a: x bar sub A minus x bar sub S is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub S minus mu sub A equals 0. H sub a: mu sub S minus mu sub A is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub A minus mu sub S equals 0. H sub a: mu sub A minus mu sub S is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.8: Setting Up a Test for the Difference of Two Population Means

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
